directions: Mix 1/4 cup olive oil with basil, savory, thyme, garlic powder, minced garlic, salt, and black pepper in a large bowl. Stir tomatoes into the herb-seasoned oil. If desired, add 1 1/2 tablespoon more olive oil for richness. Let the topping stand for 1 hour to blend flavors before serving.
ingredients: 1/3 cup loosely packed basil leaves, very thinly sliced
salt and ground black pepper to taste
title: Summer Savory Bruschetta Topping
